description: The Basket of Gold (Aurinia Saxatilis 'Dudley Nevill Variegated') is a amazing, low-maintenance, and drought-tolerant plant guaranteed to brighten up any garden. It has densely compacted evergreen, gray-green foliage intertwined with white clusters of small flowers in the spring. It's versatile and can be used in rock and gravel garden or as a border. The interesting variegation makes it an eye-catching feature that stands out from the rest. This evergreen perennial is a great addition to any garden for all four seasons.
